00010 Polynomial PolynomialMenu::select(){
00011   display();
00012   unsigned index;
00013   unsigned limit = vp.size();
00014   if(limit==0) return 0;
00015   index = limit;
00016   while(index >= limit)
00017     index = uv.guardedInput("Please select a polynomial: ",
00018                 "Must be a valid index",
00019                 -1);
00020   return vp[index];
00021 }
00022 
00023 void PolynomialMenu::evaluatePolynomial(){
00024   double a;
00025   Polynomial p = select();
00026   a = dv.input("Enter point to evaluate at: ");
00027   cout<<"P("<<a<<")= "<<p(a)<<"\n\n";
00028   return;
00029 }

00031 void PolynomialMenu::display(){
00032   vector<Polynomial>::iterator i;
00033   int c;
00034   for (i = vp.begin(), c=0; i != vp.end(); i++, c++)
00035     cout<<"P["<<c<<"]: "<<*i<<'\n';
00036   return;
00037 }

00039 pair<Polynomial,Polynomial> PolynomialMenu::select2(){
00040   display();
00041   unsigned index1;
00042   unsigned index2;
00043   unsigned limit = vp.size();
00044   if(limit==0) return pair<Polynomial, Polynomial> (0,0);
00045   index1 = limit;
00046   while(index1 >= limit)
00047     index1 = uv.guardedInput("Please select a polynomial: ",
00048                  "Must be a valid index",
00049                  -1);
00050   index2 = limit;
00051   while(index2 >= limit)
00052     index2 = uv.guardedInput("Please select second polynomial: ",
00053                  "Must be a valid index",
00054                    -1);
00055   return pair<Polynomial,Polynomial> (vp[index1], vp[index2]);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void PolynomialMenu::multiplyPolynomials(){
00059   pair<Polynomial,Polynomial> p = select2();
00060   vp.push_back(p.first * p.second);
00061   return;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void PolynomialMenu::addPolynomials(){
00065   pair<Polynomial, Polynomial> p = select2();
00066   vp.push_back(p.first + p.second);
00067   return;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void PolynomialMenu::subtractPolynomials(){
00071   pair<Polynomial,Polynomial> p = select2();
00072   vp.push_back(p.first - p.second);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void PolynomialMenu::scalePolynomial(){
00076   vp.push_back(Polynomial(1) * // dummy value to help compiler find *
00077            dv.guardedInput("Enter Scale factor: ",
00078                    "Non-zero values make sense here",
00079                 0.0)
00080            * select());
00081   return;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void PolynomialMenu::derivativePolynomial() {
00085   vp.push_back(derivative(select()));
00086 }
00087 
00088 void PolynomialMenu::antiderivativePolynomial() {
00089   vp.push_back(antiderivative(select()));
00090 }
00091 
00092 Polynomial PolynomialMenu::inputPolynomial(){
00093   Polynomial p;
00094   Polynomial *a;
00095   double coef;
00096   unsigned deg;
00097   unsigned terms;
00098   terms = uv.input("Enter number of terms to add: ");
00099   while(terms){
00100     deg = uv.guardedInput("Enter degree of term: ",
00101               "Degree must be nonnegative: ",
00102               -1);
00103     coef = dv.input("Enter coefficient of term: ");
00104     a = new Polynomial(coef,deg);
00105     p += *a;
00106     delete a;
00107     terms--;
00108   }
00109   return p;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void PolynomialMenu::deletePolynomial(){
00113   display();
00114   unsigned index;
00115   unsigned limit = vp.size();
00116   if(limit == 0) return;
00117   index = limit;
00118   while(index >= limit)
00119     index = uv.guardedInput("Enter polynomial to delete: ",
00120                 "Must select a valid polynomial number",
00121                 -1);
00122   vp.erase(vp.begin() + index);
00123   return;
00124 }

00126 bool PolynomialMenu::displayMenu(){
00127   cout<<"\n\t0. Quit\n"
00128       <<"\t1. Input Polynomial\n"
00129       <<"\t2. Display polynomials\n"
00130       <<"\t3. Add Polynomials\n"
00131       <<"\t4. Multiply Polynomials\n"
00132       <<"\t5. Evaluate Polynomial at point\n"
00133       <<"\t6. Delete Polynomial\n"
00134       <<"\t7. Subtract Polynomials\n"
00135       <<"\t8. Scale Polynomial\n"
00136       <<"\t9. Calculate first derivative\n"
00137       <<"\t10. Calculate antiderivative\n";
00138   return true;
00139 }

00141 bool PolynomialMenu::processResponse(){
00142   int response;
00143   response = iv.guardedInput("\t\tPlease choose an option: ",
00144                  "\t\tSelect an option from above: ", -1);
00145   switch(response){
00146   case 0:
00147     return false;
00148     break;
00149   case 1: // add to vector of polynomials
00150     vp.push_back(inputPolynomial());
00151     break;
00152   case 2: //  show polynomials in vector
00153     display();
00154     break;
00155   case 3:
00156     addPolynomials();
00157     break;
00158   case 4:
00159     multiplyPolynomials();
00160     break;
00161   case 5:
00162     evaluatePolynomial();
00163     break;
00164   case 6:
00165     deletePolynomial();
00166     break;
00167   case 7:
00168     subtractPolynomials();
00169     break;
00170   case 8:
00171     scalePolynomial();
00172     break;
00173   case 9:
00174     derivativePolynomial();
00175     break;
00176   case 10:
00177     antiderivativePolynomial();
00178     break;
00179   default:
00180     cout<<"\nUnrecognized response\n";
00181     break;
00182   }
00183   return true;
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 void PolynomialMenu::runProgram(){
00188   while(displayMenu() && processResponse()) ;
00189   return;
00190 }
00191 
00192 PolynomialMenu::PolynomialMenu(){
00193   runProgram();
